name: Belenos Clean Power Holding Ltd
goal: Belenos develops and industrialises high performance batteries for mobility which are relying on conflict free active materials - no Ni, no Co - for the cathode. The innovation led within Belenos open opportunities for European-based sustainable secure supply of the required active materials for hightech batteries while optimizing the circular usage of the active materials.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Active member and attendee within European Battery Alliance
Meeting active with INNOENERGY in order to promote the new innovative cathode materials
Participant to EASE and to serveral working groups
